item.title: Using 3dAFNItoNIFTI to convert AFNI files to NIFTI files
item.description: This recipe converts BRIK/HEAD (AFNI) files to NIFTI (.nii) files using 3dAFNItoNIFTI. https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dAFNItoNIFTI.html 1 2 3 #!/bin/bash 3dAFNItoNIFTI -prefix prefixname dataset
